tests.name: PNG exists in A01-eda/figs
tests.run: bash -lc 'set -e; if ls A01-eda/figs/*.png >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ::notice::Found PNGs:; ls -1 A01-eda/figs/*.png; else echo ::error::No PNG found in A01-eda/figs. Save with plt.savefig("../figs/<name>.png"); ls -la A01-eda/figs || true; exit 1; fi'

tests.name: PNG was updated in this PR
tests.run: bash -lc 'set -e; if git rev-parse --verify origin/main >/dev/null 2>&1; then CHANGED=$(git diff --name-only origin/main...HEAD | grep -E ^A01-eda/figs/.+\.(png|jpg|jpeg)$ || true); if [ -n "$CHANGED" ]; then echo ::notice::Changed PNGs:; echo "$CHANGED"; else echo ::error::No figure changes detected. Edit the plot (e.g., bins) and re-save to A01-eda/figs/.; git diff --name-only origin/main...HEAD | sed "s/^/Changed file: /" || true; exit 1; fi; else echo ::notice::No baseline (first push) — skipping diff check.; fi'

tests.name: README note updated
tests.run: bash -lc 'set -e; if grep -Ei "result|figure|summary|bins|hist|png" A01-eda/README.md; then echo ::notice::README contains a short note.; else echo ::error::Add a 1–2 sentence note to A01-eda/README.md describing your change (e.g., bins=12).; exit 1; fi'
